original_text: And Amnon said unto Tamar, Bring the meat into the chamber, that I may eat of thine hand. And Tamar took the cakes which she had made, and brought them into the chamber to Amnon her brother.
korean_text: 암논이 다말에게 이르되 음식물을 가지고 침실로 들어오라 내가 네 손에서 먹으리라 하니 다말이 자기가 만든 과자를 가지고 침실에 들어가 그의 오라버니 암논에게 이르러

sentences.original_text: Bring the meat into the chamber
that I may eat of thine hand
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 네 손으로부터 먹게 하려 함이라

sentences.original_text: and brought them into the chamber to Amnon
